metadata.title: CVE-2023-42114 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
[Exim NTLM Challenge Out-Of-Bounds Read Information DisclosureVulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: exim4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1').
